backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with access control mixins, storage mixins, numerous data types, and in-memory maps for profiles, glossary, articles, research papers, learning sections, market data, and blogs.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summarized descriptions of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and global styles.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation explaining the staged deployment retry process, common issues, and verification steps for frontend and backend builds.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template with font loading, favicon declarations, and root mount point for the frontend app.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Describes available deployment helper scripts, including a script for full build-and-deploy retries with logs.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-and-deploy-: Bash script automating dependency installation, frontend build, canister build, and deployment with detailed logging and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, query client, maintenance-mode handling, and the global layout including header, footer, and chat widget.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the brand logo with error handling and optional text fallback when the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Cash: Displays a cash‑flow table with optional running balance and supports exporting the data to CSV, with an empty-state fallback.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Renders an investment breakdown donut chart using SVG, handling empty states and showing invested vs earned proportions.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Implements an interactive chat widget with intent detection, backend queries, disclaimers, and UI controls for sending and displaying messages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a footer with an Indian market ticker, determining live or closing data and rendering NIFTY 50 stock prices.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: Provides UI and logic to export, validate, and restore glossary snapshots with merge or replace options and confirmation flows.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with theme switching, authentication controls, navigation links, and calculator menus.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Shows a branded maintenance screen with messaging and styling when the app is in maintenance mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, persistence, and status management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for maintenance checks, admin checks, user profiles, chat, and glossary data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive theme tokens for light and dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with sections for mission, vision, and educational philosophy using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays article categories in tabbed layout and lists fetched articles with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Provides an APY calculator based on age and desired pension, using an internal contribution matrix and showing computed results.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single blog post with metadata, tags, content, and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists blog posts with metadata previews, tags, and navigation to individual blog detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Implements a CAGR calculator that computes growth rate from initial value, final value, and time period with user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Renders categorized lists of financial calculators with navigation links and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact and feedback form with email links and submission via a feedback API.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Displays legal disclaimers about investment risks and clarifies the site's educational purpose.
frontend/src/pages/DomainNamePage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates and displays EMI, total interest, and total repayment based on loan inputs.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes EPF contributions, interest, and maturity balance from salary and rate inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a UI to calculate fixed deposit maturity amounts using simple or quarterly compound interest based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: Displays an admin-only feedback management panel with authentication, search, sorting, and table rendering of all feedback entries.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: Compares fixed-rate and reducing-balance loan interest by computing total repayment and interest for both methods.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Implements a searchable financial glossary with grouped terms, admin backup/restore options, and reference linking between terms.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Provides a gratuity calculator using salary and years of service inputs with eligibility checks and formatted output.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates GST, CGST, and SGST for a given amount and rate, showing tax breakdown and total after-tax amount.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Computes home loan EMI, total interest, and repayment using principal, rate, and tenure inputs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main landing page with hero content, navigation buttons, and feature cards for financial education resources.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates HRA exemption and taxable components based on salary, rent, DA, and city type with formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Displays financial learning sections fetched from an API with collapsible content and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Calculates lump-sum investment maturity and gains using compound interest and shows results with charts and schedules.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: A React page that calculates NPS corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension based on user inputs and displays results with form controls.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: A calculator page for NSC returns that computes maturity value and interest earned using compound interest inputs.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: A PPF calculator page that computes total invested amount, interest earned, and maturity value using yearly contributions and shows a breakdown chart.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: A Recurring Deposit calculator that computes total deposits, interest earned, and maturity value using monthly contributions and compound growth.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: A static informational page displaying SEBI, RBI, and fraud awareness guidelines using tabbed sections and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: A page that fetches and lists research papers with download links, showing loading and empty states as needed.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: Simple interest calculator page computing interest and total amount from principal, rate, and time inputs.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: Page that compares simple and compound interest, calculating maturity values and the difference based on compounding frequency.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: React page for calculating SIP future value, invested amount, returns, and generating a monthly contribution schedule.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: React page that computes SSY maturity value, investment duration, and interest based on yearly deposits and the child's age.
React page implementing step-up SIP calculators for amount and percentage modes, including state handling, calculation logic, and UI layout.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: React page that simulates systematic withdrawals from an investment, calculating total withdrawn, final balance, and net gain or loss.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: React page for calculating XIRR using user-defined dated cash flows with add/remove functionality and a Newton-Raphson solver.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Utility functions for detecting language, intent, and building refusal responses for the ArthSaathi chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Centralized helper for generating static asset URLs using Vite's base path, plus brand constants.
frontend/src/utils/cashFlowSchedules.ts: Helpers for generating cash flow schedules, labels, and running balances for calculator components.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Client-side CSV creation utilities including field escaping, array-to-CSV conversion, and download triggering.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formatting utilities for INR currency, Indian-style numbers, and percentage strings.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions to extract main content and references, with normalization helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, container settings, extended animations, and plugin integration for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s versioned state, high-level summary, and a list of implemented frontend and backend features including routing, theming, authentication, RBAC, maintenance mode, and content APIs.
